node.title: groovy-004 "G-STEP" faded crewneck
node.description: designed by GROOVY BASEMENTÂ®'s artist team, "G-STEP" piece captures smoothness and confidence that one can find as they become more in tune with their inner selves. design is printed on a soothing heavyweight sweater that's been pigment-dyed with vintage character female model 5'6" wearing L sandstone, male model 6'2" wearing XXL pigment black *10% of proceeds go to GROOVY Creative Fund to support rising creatives in the Chicagoland area. ordering a size up is always recommended ðŸ˜Œ fit & sizing: -baggy unisex fit features:-9oz (300 gm) 80% cotton/20% polyester blend-100% cotton 30 singles face yarn split stitch double needle sewing on all seams-twill neck tape-1 x 1 ribbing at neck, cuffs and waistband how to care: -wash inside out on delicate, cold temp-air dry recommended
node.descriptionHtml:
designed by GROOVY BASEMENTÂ®'s artist team, "G-STEP" piece captures smoothness and confidence that one can find as they become more in tune with their inner selves. design is printed on a soothing heavyweight sweater that's been pigment-dyed with vintage character

female model 5'6" wearing L sandstone, male model 6'2" wearing XXL pigment black

*10% of proceeds go to GROOVY Creative Fund to support rising creatives in the Chicagoland area.

ordering a size up is always recommended ðŸ˜Œ

fit & sizing:

-baggy unisex fit

features:
-9oz (300 gm) 80% cotton/20% polyester blend
-100% cotton 30 singles face yarn split stitch double needle sewing on all seams
-twill neck tape
-1 x 1 ribbing at neck, cuffs and waistband

how to care:

-wash inside out on delicate, cold temp
-air dry recommended

-NOT FOR SALE-

fit & sizing

node.title: groovy-000 "CHERRYONTOP" faded bucket hat
node.description: part of the "000 Core Collection", this bucket hat is a classic item that blends with any type of style *10% of proceeds go to GROOVY Creative Fund to support rising creatives in the Chicagoland area. fit & sizing: -standard, unisex fit -one size fits most (not XL heads) -crown: 8.c cm & brim 4.5cm features:-4 brass eyelets -self fabric sweatband how to care: -wash inside out on delicate, low temp -air dry -more you wash, shorter longevity of embroidery
node.descriptionHtml:
part of the "000 Core Collection", this bucket hat is a classic item that blends with any type of style

*10% of proceeds go to GROOVY Creative Fund to support rising creatives in the Chicagoland area.

fit & sizing:
-standard, unisex fit
-one size fits most (not XL heads)
-crown: 8.c cm & brim 4.5cm

features:
-4 brass eyelets
-self fabric sweatband

how to care:
-wash inside out on delicate, low temp
-air dry
-more you wash, shorter longevity of embroidery

node.title: groovy-000 GROOVY Crew Official heavyweight tee
node.description: part of the "000 Core Collection", this piece is the official GROOVY Crew heavyweight tee that is available to public. GROOVY Crew serves as a community of individuals pouring their hearts into their creative outlet, thereby living as proof to inspire more creativity in the world around us. model 5'6" wearing XL *10% of proceeds go to GROOVY Creative Fund to support rising creatives in the Chicagoland area. fit & sizing: -men's sizing-heavy duty, thicc & comforting -oversized -thick neck ribbing features: -100% USA cotton (charcoal grey: 50% USA cotton & 50% polyester) -7.5 oz 16 singles -3.5% lycra mock neck ribbing -heavy knitting how to care: -wash inside out on delicate, cold temp -air dry recommended

node.title: groovy-001 "OG" heavyweight oversized tee
node.description: designed by GROOVY BASEMENTÂ®'s artist team, "OG" piece captures the liveliness of a groove that can be found internally. this groove, while internal, can be expressed boldly, as it is printed largely and boldly in the back. female model 5'4" wearing XL, male model 5'6" wearing M *10% of proceeds go to GROOVY Creative Fund to support rising creatives in the Chicagoland area. fit & sizing -men's sizing -heavy duty, thicc & comforting -oversized -thick neck ribbing features: -100% USA cotton (charcoal grey: 50% USA cotton & 50% polyester) -7.5 oz 16 singles -3.5% lycra mock neck ribbing -heavy knitting how to care: -wash inside out on delicate, cold temp -air dry recommended

node.title: groovy-003 "TOGETHER" super-heavyweight oversized hoodie
node.description: designed by GROOVY BASEMENTÂ®'s artist team, "TOGETHER" piece is inspired by the friendship of two of our members, hand-drawn the moment that's been captured as they grooved at a music festival together. this design is printed on a soothing, thicc pastel hoodie model 5'6" wearing M *10% of proceeds go to GROOVY Creative Fund to support rising creatives in the Chicagoland area. fit & sizing: -men's sizing-oversized fit features: -10 oz (330 gm) 70% cotton/30% polyester blend 3-end fleece-handcrafted with premium ring spun cotton-created with a 3-end fleece for comfort-premium heavyweight garment-heavy gauge round drawcord-nickel eyelets how to care: -wash inside out, cold temp-air dry recommended

node.title: groovy-006 "LOSE&FIND" sweatpants
node.description: designed by GROOVY BASEMENTÂ®'s artist team, "LOSE&FIND" piece is derived from our slogan "Lose & Find Yourself". when you let go and lose yourself a little, it gives space for you to explore yourself deeper thereby discovering more creativity in you. this design is printed on a dense, high quality sweatpants that move and flow with you. *10% of proceeds go to GROOVY Creative Fund to support rising creatives in the Chicagoland area. fit & sizing: -men's sizing -differential rise from better fit -baggy fit features: -9.5 oz (322 g) -50% cotton/50% polyester pre-shrunk fleece -three-needle covered elastic waistband with inside drawcord -side entry jersey-lined pockets -elastic bottom leg openings how to care: -wash on delicate, cold temp -air dry recommended

designed by GROOVY BASEMENTÂ®'s artist team, "LOSE&FIND" piece is derived from our slogan "Lose & Find Yourself". when you let go and lose yourself a little, it gives space for you to explore yourself deeper thereby discovering more creativity in you. this design is printed on a dense, high quality sweatpants that move and flow with you.

*10% of proceeds go to GROOVY Creative Fund to support rising creatives in the Chicagoland area.

-elastic bottom leg openings

how to care:

-air dry recommended

node.title: groovy-008 "LOOKWITHIN" hemp tote bag
node.description: designed by GROOVY BASEMENTÂ®'s artist team, "LOOKWITHIN" piece is designed to provoke soul searching, something required to find deeper levels of creativity. this design is printed on a compartmentalized hemp tote bag *every purchase supports environmental non-profit organizations*10% of proceeds go to GROOVY Creative Fund to support rising creatives in the Chicagoland area. sizing: -14 1/2" W x 14 1/2" H x 4" D -5" x 5" interior hanging pocket features: -6.8 oz, 55% hemp, 45 % cotton -21" self-fabric handles how to care: -wash inside out on delicate, cold temp -air dry recommended

node.title: limited-002 "IDGAF" premium faded hoodie
node.description: part of the "LIMITED Collection", "IDGAF" piece is inspired by the ability to claim internal space, block out any hate and distraction one may experience in life. sometimes, ignorance is bliss. this allows us to channel our creative energy into things that are more fulfilling. this design is embroidered on a soothing heavyweight pastel hoodie that's been pigment-dyed with vintage character models 5'6" wearing XL *10% of proceeds go to GROOVY Creative Fund to support rising creatives in the Chicagoland area. fit & sizing: -unisex-slightly oversized features: -9oz (300 gm) 80% cotton/20% polyester blend-100% cotton 30 singles face yarn split stitch double needle sewing on all seams-1 x 1 ribbing at cuffs and waistband-sewn eyelets how to care: -wash inside out on delicate, cold temp-air dry recommended

node.title: limited-005 "BADBAD" premium distressed tee
node.description: part of the "LIMITED Collection", "BADBAD" piece is for all the introverted, extroverted, quiet, loud baddies out there. this design is printed on a mineral/vintage washed tee. male model 6'2" wearing XXL denim, female model 5'6" wearing L black *10% of proceeds go to GROOVY Creative Fund to support rising creatives in the Chicagoland area. fit & sizing: -unisex-straight fit features: -4.3 oz, 100% ringspun combed cotton-preshrunk to minimize shrinkage-double-needle top stitch at sleeves, bottom hem, shoulders, and armhole-shoulder-to-shoulder tape-side seamed construction how to care: -wash inside out on delicate, cold temp-air dry-more you wash, less longevity of embroidery
node.descriptionHtml:
part of the "LIMITED Collection", "BADBAD" piece is for all the introverted, extroverted, quiet, loud baddies out there. this design is printed on a mineral/vintage washed tee.

male model 6'2" wearing XXL denim, female model 5'6" wearing L black

*10% of proceeds go to GROOVY Creative Fund to support rising creatives in the Chicagoland area.

fit & sizing:

-unisex
-straight fit


features:

-4.3 oz, 100% ringspun combed cotton
-preshrunk to minimize shrinkage
-double-needle top stitch at sleeves, bottom hem, shoulders, and armhole
-shoulder-to-shoulder tape
-side seamed construction

how to care:

-wash inside out on delicate, cold temp
-air dry
-more you wash, less longevity of embroidery

node.title: limited-002 "IDGAF" premium faded hoodie
node.description: part of the "LIMITED Collection", "IDGAF" piece is inspired by the ability to claim internal space, block out any hate and distraction one may experience in life. sometimes, ignorance is bliss. this allows us to channel our creative energy into things that are more fulfilling. this design is embroidered on a soothing heavyweight pastel hoodie that's been pigment-dyed with vintage character models 5'6" wearing XL *10% of proceeds go to GROOVY Creative Fund to support rising creatives in the Chicagoland area. fit & sizing: -unisex-slightly oversized features: -9oz (300 gm) 80% cotton/20% polyester blend-100% cotton 30 singles face yarn split stitch double needle sewing on all seams-1 x 1 ribbing at cuffs and waistband-sewn eyelets how to care: -wash inside out on delicate, cold temp-air dry recommended
